segments.text: Excuse me ! Do you know of any hotel nearby ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes.There are the Huangshan Hotel and Anshan Hotel nearby.And you can take a taxi to go there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You're welcome ! By the way , you'd better booked in the Internet or the telephone next time and then you kow whether there are rooms available or not .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see , thank you very much !
segments.speaker: S1
